mapper.select: SELECT statusType FROM record WHERE account = #{account} ORDER BY recordId DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN statusType = 1 THEN CASE WHEN signDuration > 480 THEN 0 ELSE signDuration END ELSE CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, startDate, NOW()) > 480 THEN 0 ELSE TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, startDate, NOW()) END END) / 60, 1) AS signDuration FROM record WHERE account = #{account} AND reportDate = CURDATE()

SELECT ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN statusType = 1 THEN CASE WHEN signDuration > 480 THEN 0 ELSE signDuration END ELSE CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, startDate, NOW()) > 480 THEN 0 ELSE TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, startDate, NOW()) END END) / 60, 1) AS signDuration FROM record WHERE account = #{account} AND YEARWEEK(reportDate, 1) = YEARWEEK(CURDATE(), 1);

SELECT ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN statusType = 1 THEN CASE WHEN signDuration > 480 THEN 0 ELSE signDuration END ELSE CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, startDate, NOW()) > 480 THEN 0 ELSE TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, startDate, NOW()) END END) / 60, 1) AS signDuration FROM record WHERE account = #{account} AND MONTH(reportDate) = MONTH(CURDATE()) AND YEAR(reportDate) = YEAR(CURDATE())

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN statusType = 1 THEN CASE WHEN signDuration > 480 THEN 0 ELSE signDuration END ELSE CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, startDate, NOW()) > 480 THEN 0 ELSE TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, startDate, NOW()) END END) AS signDuration FROM record WHERE account = #{account} AND YEARWEEK(reportDate, 1) = YEARWEEK(CURDATE(), 1) -- 使用 YEARWEEK 判断本周的数据
mapper.insert: insert into record (startDate, endDate, reportDate, signDuration, statusType, account) values (#{startDate}, #{endDate} , #{reportDate}, #{signDuration}, #{statusType}, #{account})
insert into record (startDate, reportDate, statusType, account) values (now(), DATE(now()), 0, #{account})
mapper.update: UPDATE record SET endDate = now(), signDuration = TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, startDate, NOW()), statusType = 1 WHERE account = #{account} AND statusType = 0 ORDER BY startDate DESC LIMIT 1
